ygData.messageBody:
Grrrrrrr!

-----Original Message-----
From: thornley@... [mailto:thornley@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 10:44 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] GREAT IDEA


From: "B & H T" <thornley@...>


I found a great new Internet company. They pay you to surf the Web. They even
pay you when your friends are surfing the Web. (Which is why I have my ID#
AQQ486 as the last six digits in this hot link.) Hit the link now. Sign up
(less than a minute - NO SURVEY) and then go tell your friends.

http://alladvantage.com/go.asp?refid=AQQ486

Let me know when you sign up.

Regards,
Hawktro
Member ID# aqq486
